Text:
You should really delete the funky characters from your description, it makes it nearly illegible and is pretty annoying. this is as bad as ;amp; or some shit in place of a & sign.

that said it's a minor complaint and has nothing to do with the quality of this upload.
personally i also don't like names in torrent name but couple of my torrents where posted on other torrent sites i only did it to stop that and i will think about what u have said
